
### where's the linker


* where's the code that calls `open("...libc.so.6")`?
* could check `hello.exe` --- it's not there! 
<hr class="vspace" />
* instead: "interpreter" `/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2`
* on Linux: contains loading code instead of core OS 
   * OS loads it instead of program



### objdump --- the interpreter



* excerpt from <code>objdump -sx hello.exe</code>:
 
<pre><code>Program Header:
<it>...</it>
  INTERP off    0x0000238 vaddr 0x0<em>400318</em> paddr 0x0400238 align 2**0
         filesz 0x000001c memsz 0x000001c flags r--
<it>...</it>
Contents of section .interp:
 <em>400318</em> 2f6c6962 36342f6c 642d6c69 6e75782d  <em>/lib64/ld-linux-</em>
 400328 7838362d 36342e73 6f2e3200           <em>x86-64.so.2</em>.    
</code></pre>
